name: The Mighty Will Fall
description:
A hero who once saved the world from the brink of destruction travels to the edge of the world to find a place worth waving his banner for the final time.

A simple, short turn-based RPG built around carrying momentum. Defeating your opponents using their elemental weakness, allowing you to use that enemy's elemental magic to deal Critical Damage.

A game where the goal is not to win, not to survive, but to achieve greatness by making it as far as possible. Only then, can you truly be free.

NOTE:

Please read the Manual .PDF provided with the game, as it explains controls and the UI. The game would be very difficult without it.

Design: VenBright (@VenBright)

Art: Christa Megee (@SpoiledChestnut)

Code/UI: Vindaloo (@VindalooGameDev)
Original music: https://monishcorona.com/music
